EmailTemplate.name: BCBS Oklahoma Provider Email to Case
EmailTemplate.subject: BCBS of Oklahoma Inquiry Received: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Oklahoma.
This email is confirmation we have received your request, case number {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Please see below for approximate processing times for the different request/inquiry types. Once completed, a notification will be sent to the email address submitted. PROVIDER NOTIFICATION - DEMOGRAPHIC ADD/CHANGE/TERM Please allow minimum 30-45 days for the request to be processed. SOLO PROVIDER/GROUP CONTRACTING PACKET Please allow minimum 60-90 days for the request to be processed. ALL OTHER INQUIRIES Please allow minimum 30-45 days for your request to be processed. STATUS FOLLOW-UP It is recommended that status updates be requested no earlier than: 30 days for Provider Notification Forms and all other inquiries 45 days for Solo Provider Contracting Packets
To check the status of your case, please click on status checker ({!$Setup.UtilitySettings_Hierarchy__c.CaseStatusUrl__c}) or for any questions, contact 1-800-722-3730 or email oknetworkmanagement@bcbsok.com.
Sincerely, Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Oklahoma
